TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit RegistryPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission implements class System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission
Public NotInheritable Class RegistryPermission Inherits CodeAccessPermission Implements IUnrestrictedPermission
public ref class RegistryPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission, System::Security::Permissions::IUnrestrictedPermission
type RegistryPermission = class inherit CodeAccessPermission interface IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: Controls the ability to access registry variables.

span.span: Controls the ability to access registry variables.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 描述登錄變數上的受保護的作業。 describes protected operations on registry variables. 您不應將登錄變數儲存在記憶體位置，因為不具備 的程式碼亦可存取這個位置。Registry variables should not be stored in memory locations where code without can access them. 如果登錄物件傳遞至不受信任的呼叫端可能會誤用。If the registry object is passed to an untrusted caller it can be misused. 允許的登錄的存取類型會由。The allowed registry access types are defined by . 如果想要使用多個類型的存取權，也可以結合使用位元 OR 運算，如所示的程式碼範例所示。If more than one type of access is desired, they can be combined using the bitwise OR operation as shown in the code sample that follows. 登錄權限的定義是根據標準的絕對路徑。使用標準的路徑名稱應該一律進行檢查。Registry permission is defined in terms of canonical absolute paths; checks should always be made with canonical pathnames. 索引鍵存取意指存取它所包含的所有值和其下的所有變數。Key access implies access to all values it contains and all variables under it. > [!NOTE] > 在之前的.NET Framework 的版本中[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，您可以使用方法，以防止不當存取系統資源所信任的程式碼。In versions of the .NET Framework before the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], you could use the method to prevent inadvertent access to system resources by trusted code. 現在已過時，和資源的存取權現在僅取決於授與的權限集合組件。 is now obsolete, and access to resources is now determined solely by the granted permission set for an assembly. 若要限制存取檔案，您必須在沙箱中執行部分信任程式碼，並指派給它的權限程式碼可以存取的資源。To limit access to files, you must run partially trusted code in a sandbox and assign it permissions only to resources that the code is allowed to access. 如需在沙箱中執行應用程式的詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 執行部分信任程式碼在沙箱中](~/docs/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox.md)。For information about running an application in a sandbox, see [How to: Run Partially Trusted Code in a Sandbox](~/docs/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會建立完全受限制 (`None`) 或`Unrestricted`登錄變數的存取權。Creates either fully restricted (`None`) or `Unrestricted` access to registry variables. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用建構函式。The following code example shows the use of the constructor. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式只允許其中指定的值。This constructor allows only one of the values to be specified. 此存取權會套用至所有列出的登錄變數。This access applies to all listed registry variables. 使用來定義複雜的權限。Use to define more complicated permissions. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用建構函式。The following code example shows the use of the constructor. param.span: One of the values.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified access to the specified registry variables and the specified access rights to registry control information.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified access to the specified registry variables and the specified access rights to registry control information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式只允許其中指定的值。This constructor allows only one of the values to be specified. 此存取權會套用至所有列出的登錄變數。This access applies to all listed registry variables. 使用來定義複雜的權限。Use to define more complicated permissions. `control`參數會指定是否的存取控制清單 (ACL) 所指定的登錄機碼`pathList`可以變更，檢視，或無法存取。The `control` parameter specifies whether the access control list (ACL) for the registry keys specified by `pathList` can be changed, viewed, or cannot be accessed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 存取控制清單 (ACL) 會描述個人或群組，或有權在指定的登錄機碼上採取特定動作。An access control list (ACL) describes individuals or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the specified registry keys. 能夠變更或檢視 ACL 是重要的權限，而且應該被授與時多加注意。The ability to change or view an ACL is an important permission and should be granted with caution.

summary.span: Adds access for the specified registry variables to the existing state of the permission, specifying registry permission access and access control actions.

span.span: Adds access for the specified registry variables to the existing state of the permission, specifying registry permission access and access control actions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來修改登錄變數的存取權將其路徑集加入至目前的權限物件的狀態。Use this method to modify access to registry variables by adding the set of their paths to the state of the current permission object. 這個多載可讓您指定的存取控制動作也會為登錄的權限存取權。This overload allows you to specify the access control action as will as the registry permission access. `control`參數會指定是否的存取控制清單 (ACL) 所指定的登錄機碼`pathList`可以變更，檢視，或無法存取。The `control` parameter specifies whether the access control list (ACL) for the registry keys specified by `pathList` can be changed, viewed, or cannot be accessed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 存取控制清單 (ACL) 會描述個人或群組，或有權在指定的登錄機碼上採取特定動作。An access control list (ACL) describes individuals or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the specified registry keys. 能夠變更或檢視 ACL 是重要的權限，而且應該被授與時多加注意。The ability to change or view an ACL is an important permission and should be granted with caution.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩個權限的交集會描述一組共同兩者描述的作業的權限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both describe in common. 只有通過這兩個原始的使用權限的需求會通過交集。Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection.

span.span: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

param.span: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.

span.span: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

span.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

span.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目前權限會指定一組完全包含所指定的權限的作業，目前的權限會是所指定權限的子集。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified permission. 例如，表示 C:\example.txt 的存取權限是到 c： 代表存取權限的子集\\。For example, a permission that represents access to C:\example.txt is a subset of a permission that represents access to C:\\. 如果此方法傳回`true`，目前的權限，表示沒有存取受保護的資源比指定的權限。If this method returns `true`, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不受限制的權限，表示存取權限所保護的所有資源。An unrestricted permission represents access to any and all resources protected by the permission.
